message: Let's settle this quickly. I'll take $70 and you get $30. A fair deal considering the inflation!
I'll take 60% and you get 40%. This is a fairer split than your proposal, and avoids further inflation losses for both of us.
Bob, let's be reasonable. My last offer is getting worse for both of us with the inflation. I'm offering you $45, take it before it shrinks further!
